EmailTemplate.description: SOFT SO Delivery to the Client.
EmailTemplate.name: Service Order Delivery - SOFT
EmailTemplate.subject: Service Order- Soft Delivery Acknowledgement (Your Response Required)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear ,
Thank you for your business with Invixium!
Reference to your PO Number:
SO#: Unique ID Number:
Please make a note of the assigned Unique ID number that would allow you to activate associated software services at your convenience. You must keep this email info as a record for future reference and confirmation of IXM software/services delivery. These services may include IXM time, IXM Link, IXM Health, IXM Convert, ASC, or others as applicable per PO/SO number. The following services are included:
1. ASC WEB 20 (January 28, 2024 to January 27, 2025) â€“ 1 No.
Note: Kindly reach out to us at your convenience to activate the above service with the following details: 1) Machine Key (in Text format): 2) Total number of Devices:
3) Activation Code:
